name: SerpApi
description: SerpApi helps developers access public data from various search engines with a simple API. We have long been aware of the importance of contributing to Open Source; of course, we use many Open Source projects. Hopefully, our joining the Pledge will raise awareness amongst other companies about the importance of giving back to Open Source projects.
shortDescription: Hopefully, our joining the Pledge will raise awareness amongst other companies about the importance of giving back to Open Source projects.
